caption:
Have you ever seen a #bison? You might spot one of these big, powerful creatures if you head west from #Winnipeg to Riding Mountain National Park’s aspen parkland; one of the best wildlife-viewing destinations in Canada! 
For more information and other #hiddengems, click the link in our bio! 
#RidingNP #ParksCanada #Canada150 #Manitoba #ExploreMB
